section.para: To view brief Sales history by Customer Type, select the "Brief Sales History by Customer Type" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Brief Sales History by Customer Type

section.para: When displaying brief Sales history by Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display brief Sales history for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose brief Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display brief Sales history by Customer Type for all Sites.
Specify Site whose brief Sales history by Customer Type you want to display.
Brief Sales history by Customer Type generated on or after this date will be displayed.
